    Memorial Day is in its final hours, and time is running out to score these incredible discounts from retailers like Amazon, Allbirds, Samsung, and more. I've gathered all of the best last-second Memorial Day sales you can shop before the holiday ends to help make your late-night shopping a little easier.

    From super-comfy sneakers to standing desks, you might be surprised what you can find on sale today. While the discounts we're seeing today aren't all-time lows, they're still some worthwhile savings on big-ticket items, like TVs and couches. That said, I recommend acting now, especially if you can't wait months for the next holiday to crop up.

    Keep scrolling to find my favorite deals from the event, plus all of the sales from retailers and brands we trust.

    Memorial Day sales and deals: Frequently asked questions

    When is Memorial Day?

    This year, Memorial Day falls on Monday, May 26.

    When do Memorial Day sales end?

    The end date for Memorial Day sales will vary by retailer. While some will extend past the actual holiday, many will end promptly once May 26 has passed. Some retailers are vague about when their sales will officially end, so unless there's an official posted end-date, it's a good rule of thumb to get your shopping done on or before Memorial Day.
